articles.description: Denver-based comic Josh Blue was a finalist on the 16th season of "AGT."
articles.content:
LOS ANGELES The votes are in and the winner of "America's Got Talent" is...
Magician Dustin Tavella.
Tavella was announced as the winner of Americas Got Talent season 16 Wednesday night on NBC.

articles.author: David Fear
articles.title: From Turd Ferguson to the Moth: Norm Macdonald’s Most Memorable TV Moments - Rolling Stone
articles.description: Highlights from the 30-year career of the comedian and ‘SNL’ star, who died Tuesday at 61
articles.content: Norm Macdonald always had a way of making mundane, everyday things — the habits of a moth, Germans’ inexplicable love of David Hasselhoff, crime in New York City — absolutely hilarious. Unlike other … [+8054 chars]

articles.author: Harry Howard
articles.title: Covid Trinidad: Health minister hits back at Nicki Minaj over swollen testicles vaccine claim - Daily Mail
articles.description: Trinidad's health chief Dr Terrence Deyalsingh (pictured) blasted the rapper, saying he and his team had 'wasted so much time running down this false claim'.
articles.content: Trinidad and Tobago's health minister has criticised Nicki Minaj for wasting his time by forcing him to look into the safety of the Covid-19 vaccine after she claimed that the jab left a cousin's fri… [+5349 chars]
